titleStmt.title: The Humble petition of the captaines, officers, and soldiers of the trayned bands, and voluntiers in the county of Buckingham, assembled at Alisbury, Iune 17, 1642 presented to both Houses of Parliament, the 24 of Iune, 1642 ... together with a letter from a merchant of Dublin to his friend a worthy gentleman in Bassing Hall Street, in London : relating the happy proceedings of the Protestant army against the rebels.
titleStmt.author: Busse, John, Merchant of Dublin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ioseph Hunscott and Iohn Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
